message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1800000.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. However, considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price closer to what I'm willing to pay. My counteroffer is $1400000.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1400000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1700000. This is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my financial situation, I would like to propose a price closer to what I am comfortable paying. My counteroffer is $1600000.

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm counteroffering at $1650000. This is as low as I'm willing to go.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I've been considering your proposal carefully, and I would like to make a counteroffer at $1600000. I hope this brings us closer to reaching an agreement.
